data.name: Potion Tales
data.detailed_description:
Potion Tales is a cosy game, about brewing potions. Listen to your customer's problems and decide what potions to brew for them.
But be careful, because your choices will decide your customers' fates.

Meet your customers


• Listen to the problems of the different inhabitants of a unique and colourful fantasy world.

• Meet a grave tender in search of new clients, a fire spirit who's training to be a water mage, an aspiring god and more.

• You'll decide the outcome of their stories with the potions you give them.

Brew all kinds of potions


• Use almost 30 different ingredients at your disposal to brew 20 unique potions.

• Discover potions and ingredients in your potion book.

• Cut, Crush Or Liquify Ingredients.

Make yourself at home


• Enjoy A Colourful Low-poly Look.

• Organize your work environment however you like.

data.short_description: Potion Tales is a potion brewing game, in which the potions you brew decide the fate of your customers. Make yourself a home in a cozy potion kitchen and prepare different potions for the unique problems of your customers.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Anything from this or the last decade
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Anything from this or the last decade
  • Storage: 110 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any internal sound card will do
  • Additional Notes: This is a really lightweight game, we'd be suprised if you had any performance issues.
